title: Urban 1Bed/1Bath - 1st Month Free!
map_address: 118 Broadway Ave E near Broadway E & E John
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 111', 'OR Text', '111', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 512 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Make your mark in the epicenter of culture, diversity and self-expression in one of Seattle’s trendiest neighborhoods.', 'Connection on Broadway offers a lifestyle that blurs the line between vibrant city life and a inclusive neighborhood.', 'Immerse yourself in an energetic location in the center of Capitol Hill, with a public farmers market on-site and Cal Anderson Park in your own backyard.', 'At home, take advantage of attractive amenities thoughtfully curated to enhance your daily routine, from a fitness center and yoga studio to a rooftop terrace.', 'Features:', 'Quartz Countertop, Gas Cooktop*, Views of Cal Anderson Park*, Balcony/Patio*, Electric Cooktop, Roller Shades, Multiple Cabinet Finishes, Engineered Hardwood Flooring, Build In Kitchen Island*, Energy Star Rated Appliance Package, Air Conditioning', 'Community Amenities:', 'Easy Access to Local Parks, Pet Spa, Pet Friendly, Weekly On Site Farmers Market, Garage Parking, On Site Boba Tea Shop: Coming Soon, On Site Brunch/Lunch Restaurant: Coming Soon!, Bike Storage, Remote Work Spaces, Fitness Center and Yoga Studio, Controlled Access Entry, Additional Storage Available, Pet Park, On Site Café: Coming Soon, On Site Community Plaza, Rooftop Grills and Fire Pits, H-Mart: Coming Soon!, On Site Management & Maintenance, Easy Access to Link Light Rail, 10 Unique Community Spaces', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet deposit fee min/max: $300 - $600', 'Pet monthly rent min/max: $50 - $100', 'Pet policy: We allow two(2) pets per unit with no weight limit following Greystar breed restrictions.', 'Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', '9Tp1mX8qV']
